name: 1. Dimex Steel Edging Hooks
description: Anchoring accessories for E-Z Connect Premium Landscape Edging. Use for additional anchoring power on curved landscape installations. Four 9 in. steel hooks included per pack. Suggested use rate for a normal installation is one hook for every 2 ft. of edging. Size and weight are approximateDurable and strong 1/8 in. steel hooksFour 9 in. steel hooks included per packHooks are functional in many other landscaping and garden projectsTo be used with E-Z Connect premium landscape edgingSize and weight are approximate
